title: What role am I?
body:
I usually get A through S+ ranks nearly every game.

My kill participation is second to none. 

I help greatly with objective control. 

My KDA is through the roof. 

My gold income is consistent. 

My team relies heavily on me. 

Yet no matter how good I do, I'm still reliant on my team.

replies.body: Not support because I have a hard as fuck time getting an S on that and its my main role. Probably Jungle since objective help.
Ez to get S's as supp if ur doing it right. I get S prob 75%+ of the games i win as  support.

> [{quoted}](name=PiksieDust,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5GvHZ3bo,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-07-05T03:46:32.115+0000)
>
> Ez to get S's as supp if ur doing it right. I get S prob 75%+ of the games i win as  support.

My problem is I'm either A. Playing Leona and I either go in and Die or my team is godlike and follows up immedietly. Either way we get kills most of the time. I'm completely fine with suiciding to get the team ahead. 

Other problem is B. If I play a mage support I try to make a fancy play and fail really bad. 

I've gotten the most S's with leona, but i'm still learning so I only get them about 25% of the time.

True, leona's an all in champ, its hard for her to escape once shes in deep. The trick is to build her rlly tankaaayy so u can take in all the dmg while ur team follows up (hopefully) & u dont die. I believe ur on ur way to becoming a great leona tho gL! 
When playing mage supports if u wanna get the S, ill advise 1) pick a support with rlly good peel - raka sona lulu janna nami thresh alistar. Trick is to alwayz have wards up before fighting in lane. And always know when to go in and not to. After lane phase always be near where all the action and team fight is. That way u can focus on helping initiate && keeping ur team and urself alive. Its always good to stay alive so u can help ur team = #S!!!

> [{quoted}](name=PiksieDust,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5GvHZ3bo,comment-id=0004000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-05T04:09:00.262+0000)
>
> True, leona's an all in champ, its hard for her to escape once shes in deep. The trick is to build her rlly tankaaayy so u can take in all the dmg while ur team follows up (hopefully) & u dont die. I believe ur on ur way to becoming a great leona tho gL! 
> When playing mage supports if u wanna get the S, ill advise 1) pick a support with rlly good peel - raka sona lulu janna nami thresh alistar. Trick is to alwayz have wards up before fighting in lane. And always know when to go in and not to. After lane phase always be near where all the action and team fight is. That way u can focus on helping initiate && keeping ur team and urself alive. Its always good to stay alive so u can help ur team = #S!!!

Those really "supporty" support have always never meshed with me. I don't like to sit back and shield a guy or provide a heal and that be my contribution to a fight. The only two i've had success with that fit that style are Karma and Taric, both of which have the ability to do something other than be passive. I've also had semi-success with bard but hes rather hit and miss for me.
i Got lucky n got a S on nami, but its cuz of my team not me...
Rito: Should be fine now. you get xp for killing wards now and assists count 10 seconds after death :D

"Yet no matter how good I do, I'm still reliant on my team." 
This should be the last clue that makes it obvious. . .

Adc.
Except that's BS because everyone knows it's all me 100% legit im pro adc ill 2v1 skrubs come at me irl
Support ? Wait I know, it's jungle
